items.sentence: We should teach children how to protect themselves.
When I moved to Boston, I was still in my thirties.
Tom was in the library with us yesterday afternoon.
What kind of clothes do you usually wear to school?
I hope that Tom can fit me into his tight schedule.
I think we should let Tom know that we\'ll be late.
I think you know Tom isn\'t going to be here today.
I think you know that that\'ll be impossible to do.
Let\'s hope the situation doesn\'t get out of hand.
Tom didn\'t get home until after 2:30 this morning.
